comment: general reaction The enzyme ec 2.1.1.182 methylates adenine1518 and adenine1519 in 23S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.183 methylates adenine1779 and adenine1780 in 18S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.184 methylates adenine2085 in 23S rRNA.
definition: 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + Adenine in rRNA <=> 2 S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + N6-Dimethyladenine in rRNA
name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:rRNA (adenine-N6-)-dimethyltransferase
